system.description:
Your mind becomes hardened to the influence of extraplanar forces. You have resistance to psychic damage and have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throws imposed by aberrations, celestials, fey, fends, and undead.

Furthermore, you never suffer any sort of ill effect merely from knowing or discovering something related to otherworldly threats or lore (The Narrator has the final say here, but is encouraged to be generous).
